summary: It's Charlie Sheen's turn to step in to the celebrity hot seat for the latest installment of The Comedy Central Roast.
cast: Charlie Sheen|Seth MacFarlane|Kate Walsh|Jeffrey Ross|Anthony Jeselnik|Jon Lovitz|Patrice O'Neal|William Shatner|Steve-O|Mike Tyson|Amy Schumer|Melorine Adler|Blake Anderson|Jackie Becker|Sierra Collins|Yuval David|Adam Devine|Stephen Kramer Glickman|Anders Holm|Liz Leyda|Slash|Duane 'Dog' Chapman|Stacy Carroll|Cary Elwes|Laura Niles|Corbin Bernsen|Beth Chapman|Perla Ferrar|Richard Kind|Maria Menounos|Brooke Mueller|Kristy Swanson|Laura Vandervoort|Patrick Warburton
title: Comedy Central Roast of Charlie Sheen
